text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://kl.dk/fhir/common/caresocial/CodeSystem/KLCommonCareSocialCodes
    CodeDisplay
    66959f77-6e2a-4574-8423-3ff097f8b9fafunktionsevneniveaufunktionsevneniveau, som kan være et FFB funktionsevneniveau eller FSIII tilstandsniveau
    90c48f03-f194-4b2f-ad7d-6cba1069ae48måltypemålet udtrykkes i form af en måltype, måltypen er den forventede ændring i tilstanden givet indsatsen
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://kl.dk/fhir/common/caresocial/ValueSet/ObservationSCTcodes

name: KLTargetMeasureCodes
title: KLTargetMeasureCodes
description: Target measure code, that determines whether the target is expressed as a severity or a change value
